content: As an AI language model, I do not have personal experiences, but in general, electric cars may cost less to maintain than traditional cars. Electric cars have fewer mechanical components and require less frequent maintenance than traditional cars. Additionally, electric cars typically have regenerative braking, which can lengthen the life of brake pads. However, the cost of maintenance for an electric car may vary depending on the specific make and model. In addition, due to the battery subsystem, electric cars may require more expensive maintenance in terms of battery replacements.
